source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_migration_db.vw_service_user

AS

SELECT 

    SU.id
    ,SU.salutation
    ,SU.firstName
    ,SU.lastName
    ,SU.addressLine1
    ,SU.addressLine2
    ,SU.addressTown
    ,SU.addressCounty
    ,SU.postcode
    ,SU.addressCountry
    ,SU.organisation
    ,SU.organisationType
    ,SU.role
    ,SU.telephoneNumber
    ,SU.otherPhoneNumber
    ,SU.faxNumber
    ,SU.emailAddress
    ,SU.webAddress
    ,SU.serviceUserType
    ,SU.caseReference
    ,SU.sourceSystem
    ,SU.sourceSuid
    ,SU.contactMethod

FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user SU

INNER JOIN (

    SELECT id, MAX(IngestionDate) AS latest_date
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user
    WHERE LOWER(ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon'
    GROUP BY id
    
) latest ON SU.id = latest.id AND SU.IngestionDate = latest.latest_date   

-- INNER JOIN odw_curated_migration_db.nsip_project AS NP ON SU.caseReference = NP.caseReference

WHERE LOWER(SU.ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon'
AND SU.serviceUserType IN ('Applicant', 'RepresentationContact');

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
view_df = spark.sql('SELECT * FROM odw_curated_migration_db.vw_service_user')
view_df.write.mode('overwrite').saveAsTable('odw_curated_migration_db.service_user')
